title: Arsenal A Top Four Lock?
description:
The FC crew recap Arsenal's 2-0 win over Crystal Palace to open the Premier League season and debate whether their performance showed the best of Arteta's side. Plus, Thomas Tuchel responds to critics who said Chelsea's summer transfer window has been "panicky" and Bayern Munich show their title chops by bashing Frankfurt on the opening day of the Bundesliga.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Arsenal come out of the gates strong; Chelsea accused of having 'panicky' transfer window; Bayern show title chops on opening day
